title: OBS Studio with projector patches
description: Custom OBS Studio build with additional projector features I personally want, while related PR are under PR review.
achievements: Setup build environment for OBS Studio on Windows and Linux
Implemented new features based on existing open PRs
Implemented brand new dialog window for the new feature with QT6
Sent PRs to OBS Studio project
screenshots: Context menu with adjust size options
Brand new Resize Window dialog, implemented with QT6
